medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Proposita A is a 43-year-old deaf woman with a large multinodular goiter and hypothyroxinemia. Proposita B is a 26-year-old deaf male with a goiter and a 1-cm nodule in the right lobe, referred for hypothyroidism.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Both proposita A and proposita B have Pendred syndrome with identified mutations, including c.279delT and c.416â€“1G 3A.
medical_history.family_history: Family A has no deaf parents or siblings, while Family B has a strong history of deafness and goiters among relatives, including both parents with profound neonatal deafness.
